Detailed Description

template<class VertexType>
class Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase2< VertexType >

A templated base class for vertex buffers.

This was created to remove the constant selection between software/hardware buffers

Member Typedef Documentation

template<class VertexType>
typedef VertexType Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase2< VertexType >::Vertex

Vertex* Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase2< VertexType >::lock ( uint32  nLockElements  )  [inline]

This method returns a pointer to the start of a vertex buffer big enough to contain nLockElements vertices.

Parameters:
nLockElements the number of vertices to allocate
Returns:
pointer to the vertices that have been allocated.

Reimplemented from Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase.

template<class VertexType>
Vertex* Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase2< VertexType >::lock2 ( uint32  nLockElements  )  [inline]

This method returns a pointer to a write only vertex buffer big enough to contain nLockElements.

These vertices will not necessarily be at the start of the vertex buffer. To get the index of the first locked vertex use the method lockIndex. It implements the best practices locking for dynamic vertex buffers.

Parameters:
nLockElements the number of vertices to allocate
Returns:
pointer to the vertices that have been allocated.

Reimplemented from Moo::DynamicVertexBufferBase.
